question.text: Where are you most likely to be affected by a side wind?

explanation.text: In windy conditions, care must be taken on exposed roads. A strong gust of wind can blow you off course. Watch out for other road users who are particularly likely to be affected, such as cyclists, motorcyclists, high-sided lorries and vehicles towing trailers.

answer.text: On an open stretch of road
On a busy stretch of road
